long_description: Timbuk2 Race Duffel Bag can be converted into a backpack for riding to/from the race or trainer session and offers easy organization of all your gear. Each end of the Race Duffel features a reinforced wet/dirty pocket to keep shoes, helmet or post-race garb separate from main compartment's contents. Constructed out of burly ballistic nylon for great resilience; thermoplastic urethane lining makes it easy to wipe up mud, spilled recovery mixes or errant embrocation. Front zip pocket, top interior zip mesh pocket and 2 external water bottle pockets make organizing small items, tools and nutritional supplements a breeze. Clamshell zip makes accessing the duffel's main compartment easy. Hauling the Race Duffel to and fro is easy and versatile, thanks to the detachable, padded backpack straps, center haul straps and end grab handles. Reflective hits increase visibility in low light.
short_description: Timbuk2 Race Duffel Bag can be converted into a backpack for riding to/from the race or trainer session and offers easy organization of all your gear.
